mapper.insert: insert into com_free(mem_no, com_free_subject, com_free_content, com_free_count, com_free_writer) values(#{mem_no},#{com_free_subject},#{com_free_content}, #{com_free_count},#{com_free_writer})
mapper.select: select * from com_free where com_free_no>0 order by com_free_no desc, com_free_regdate desc
